content: नय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नी भावे अच्] {@--1@} Leading, conducting. {@--2@} A guide. {@--3@} Suitable, right, proper. --यः {@--1@} Guiding, leading, managing. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Behaviour, course of conduct, conduct, way of life, as in दुर्नय. ({%b%}) Prudent or righteous conduct, virtue. {@--3@} Prudence, foresight, circumspection; <ls>Pt. 1. 371</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">3. 176.</ls> {@--4@} Policy, political wisdom, statesmanship, civil administration, state-policy; नयप्रचारं व्यवहारदुष्टतां <ls>Mk. 1. 7</ls>; नयगुणोपचितामिव भूपतेः सदुपकारफलां श्रियमर्थिनः <ls>R. 9. 27</ls>; नयशालिभिः <ls>Mu. 1. 22.</ls> {@--5@} Morality, justice, rectitude, equity; चलति नयान्न जिगीषतां हि चेतः <ls>Ki. 10. 29</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">2. 3</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">6. 38</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">16. 42.</ls> {@--6@} A plan, design, scheme; <ls>Pt. 1. 339</ls>; <ls n="Pt. 1.">377</ls>; <ls>Mu. 6. 11</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">7. 9.</ls> {@--7@} A maxim, principle. {@--8@} Course, method, manner. {@--9@} A system, doctrine, opinion. {@--10@} A philosophical system; वैशेषिके नये <ls>Bhāṣā P. 105.</ls> {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--12@} A kind of game.
